                        Internships
                    Become a CA Climate Action Corps Fellow!Looking to make a difference this year? Center for Healthy Communities is taking #ClimateAction & hosting 3 Fellows for the 530 Food Rescue Coalition(opens in new window) starting this August!Be a part of the 530 FRC(opens in new window) and apply at ClimateActionCorps.ca.gov(opens in new window) to become a #CAClimateActionCorps Fellow! Fellows will receive a stipend & education awards.EBT/Food Stamps for StudentsVisit www.chicostatecalfresh.org to find resources for EBT/Food Stamps and food access for students!(opens in new window)Local Food & Energy ResourcesVisit www.chcfoodassistance.org to find resources on local Farmers' Markets, EBT, and more!(opens in new window)View this profile on InstagramCenter for Healthy Communities(opens in new window) (@chcchicostate(opens in new window)) • Instagram photos and videosIf you need special accommodation to access any document on this page, please contact the Office of Accessible Technology (OATS): Call OATS (530-898-6532) | Email OATS.College of Natural SciencesScience Building, Room 413 530-898-6121naturalsciences@csuchico.eduwww.csuchico.edu/nsciSupport our College(opens in new window)Program PortfolioDepartmentsBiological SciencesChemistry & BiochemistryEarth and Environmental SciencesMathematics & StatisticsNutrition & Food SciencesPhysicsSchool of NursingScience Education
We acknowledge and are mindful that Chico State stands on lands that were originally occupied by the first people of this area, Mechoopda, and we recognize their distinctive spiritual relationship with this land, the flora, the fauna, and the waters that run through campus. We are humbled that our campus resides upon sacred lands that since time immemorial have sustained the Mechoopda people and continue to do so today.Contact UsNeed Help?FacebookFacebookTwitterTwitterInstagramInstagramReport an accessibility issueReport a broken link on this pageTitle IXPrivacy PolicyCalifornia State University, Chico400 West First StreetChico, CA 95929Copyright © 2023 All Rights Reserved
